description:
This is a free course designed to help WordPress users improve the functionality and design of their website by teaching them how to make use of some of the best WordPress plugins available.

The course follows no particular structure and the classes featured in the course can be taken at random. The course is ideal for students who who are already familiar with how to find, install and work with WordPress plugins.

Do you own a WordPress website? Would you like to learn about new plugins that can improve your website? Then this course is perfect for you.

In this course, you will learn about plugins both free and premium that can enhance your website and give it a professional look even if you don't have any experience with coding. The classes can be taken at random as the course follows no particular structure.
title: Super Plugins: A Free Guide on the Best WordPress Plugins
